title: I just found my new support main.

embed.description: Tahm Kench makes for a fine support thanks to his unrivalled ability to save his marksman from otherwise impending death. Once he's wobbled into lane, his main role is to stick with his lane buddy, making sure they're safe and able to farm at will.

body:
Man I cant wait to practice first-
Then Eat everyone ever :)

replies.body: this champ has some serious troll potential

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZOr390xn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:00:54.219+0000)
>
> this champ has some serious troll potential

You do realize the ally you swallow can get out of your mouth if they want

Only if the people play him are trolls.
I have cc and loads of ways to engage in fights or escape from them he seems very cool to me.
But yes I actually can't wait to see vids of people eating there carries and diving into the enemy fountain.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZOr390xn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:09:27.075+0000)

Really?
le swallow carry , ult into enemy nexus.
